title: Hero MotoCorp expands operations in El Salvador
description: Hero MotoCorp has expanded operations in El Salvador with the commencement of retail sales at a newly opened flagship outlet in the country's capital city San Salvador. "The strengthening and expansion of our network in El Salvador clearly underscore the market's importance for Hero MotoCorp," Hero MotoCorp Head - Global Business - Sanjay Bhan said.
